author: Reuters Editorial
title: DLH Holdings Says Units Entered Into Amendment To Certain Loan Agreement
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - DLH Holdings Corp:
* DLH HOLDINGS SAYS ON MAY 10, CO, UNITS ENTERED INTO AMENDMENT TO CERTAIN LOAN AGREEMENT DATED AS OF MAY 2, 2016 - SEC FILING
* DLH HOLDINGS SAYS AS AMENDED, MATURITY DATE OF REVOLVING CREDIT FACILITY IS MAY 1, 2021 Source bit.ly/2IEcYlA Further company coverage:
